meanings.definition: The act of burying a dead body.
meanings.sent1: The interments took place at the cemetery.
meanings.sent2: Families visit the interments of their loved ones to pay respects.
meanings.sent3: The interments were so crowded that even the ghosts had to wait in line.
meanings.sent4: The interments in the graveyard whispered stories of the past.
meanings.sent5: The solemn interments under the moonlight left a lasting impression.

meanings.definition: The place where a dead body is buried.
meanings.sent1: The interments were marked with beautiful headstones.
meanings.sent2: The old churchyard was filled with ancient interments.
meanings.sent3: The interments in the pet cemetery had quirky epitaphs.
meanings.sent4: The interments in the family plot held generations of memories.
meanings.sent5: The peaceful interments in the meadow seemed to blend with nature.
